version_description:
• New KRANIUM video filter designed by singer, songwriter and dancehall artist Kranium!
• Fixed issue where titler would change empty lines back to default

• Multi-color filter renamed
• Tweaks to the VHS tracking effect
• Minor GUI tweaks
• Fixed the broken titler button when using the professional button style

• Improvements to the VHS effect (you'll like it)
• Updated selfie camera to use mirrored picture orientation
• Selfie camera now shoots HD (if your device supports it)
• Improved finger tracking control
• Date spoof input now works better

• You can now import videos!
• Pause feature added for some slick in-camera editing!
• Reduced volume of audio tape noise/hiss per a few complaints
• Tweaks to VHS effect
• Added switch to turn off audio noise

• Fixed crash when trying to import a video
• Fixed issue where some videos would be rotated during import
• Disabled continuous autofocus (you can still touch to focus)
• Option to disable "Rolling Dropouts" now works

• Sped up display of thumbnails in import browser
• Fixed crashes with videos encoded on other devices
• Fixed visual glitch in viewport after importing a 1:1 or portrait video

• Fixed thumbnails in importer sometimes being grayed out if clips stored in iCloud
• Fixed intermittent crash after dismissing settings menu
• Improvements to importer

• Updated interface for iPhone X
• Fixed import problem with some videos

We're always improving the world's best VHS cam app for rad glitch and retro effects!
This release includes:
• Portrait recording now works with both cameras
• New red, green and blue filters
• Swipe left/right to change filters! Works while r

The original VHS cam by Rarevision!
Changes in this version:
• Improved VHS effect
• New video filters
• New VHS graphic style (we kept the old one too)
• Move and zoom titler text
• New titler font and colors
• Enter titler text dire

The original VHS cam by Rarevision!
Changes in this version:
• Improved VHS effect
• New video filters
• New VHS graphic style (we kept the old one too)
• Move and zoom titler text
• New titler font and colors
• Enter titler text dire

We listened to you, and adjusted the filters:
• Added a new Nuclear filter for edits
• Reduced brightness for imported videos
• Fixed bug that would cause a crash if device has a bad camera
• Updated Spanish translation

• Sweet quality improvements
• Tweaked filters
• Imported videos aren't as blurry
• Some other awesome bug fixes

• Added color bars filter
• Fixed issue where Instagram 1:1 videos would import as portrait

• NEW picture menu: Tweak filters the way you want!
• NEW clip viewer: It's faster and you can import directly from the viewer!
• Fixed a problem on iOS 14 where the settings menu was all messed up
• Lots of other tweaks and bug fixes

• Fixed a problem where the titler wouldn't keep its size when importing
• Added ability to turn the additional tracking noise effect on/off
• Bug fixes
